description: This file defines a TextReader class for reading text files, supporting both synchronous and asynchronous reading, and converting file contents into Document objects. It handles file input from Path objects or file-like objects, with support for chunking documents.

classes.name: TextReader
classes.description: A class for reading text files and converting their contents into Document objects, with support for synchronous and asynchronous operations, and optional chunking.

methods.name: read
methods.description: Reads a text file (Path or file-like object) synchronously and returns a list of Document objects.

methods.name: async_read
methods.description: Asynchronously reads a text file (Path or file-like object) and returns a list of Document objects.

methods.name: _async_chunk_document
methods.description: Handles chunking of a Document asynchronously, returning a list of chunked Document objects.
